dmca.title: DMCA removal
dmca.body:
Dear Sir or Madam:

I represent Affinity Internet, Inc. doing business as
ValueWeb.  ValueWeb has received a complaint alleging
that information on your website infringes another
entity's copyright.  Please review the attached letter
and take the actions you deem necessary.

Attached PDF file:

[Private]
ATTORNEY AT LAW
[Private]
WASHINGTON, D.C. 20009
TELEPHONE: [Private]
